1.0.1.en: Readme updated. Set device unavailable on error.

1.0.3.en: Added Energy meter for today and this month. Polling fixed setting 1 minute. Better error message display for UI. Added additional logging during pairing.

1.1.0.en: Added inverter detection for type 'tlxh'. Added Meter driver. Added Battery driver.

1.1.1.en: Fixed PV values. Fixed error when multiple devices per plant.

1.1.2.en: Added detection for type 'mix' and 'max'. Added second battery detection. Added detection of no new data coming in. Fix meter and PV for type 'mix'

1.1.3.en: New driver icons. Reduced polling to 5 minutes interval.
